title: Toothpaste
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BOq1MN

by SassyFanGirl

After getting into a fight, Dan gets hurt. They will have to work through their problems whether they like it or not.
AKA-Phil is dumb, then Dan is dumb. Phil then has to take care of a depressed and, literally, broken Dan.
Not good at summaries. It’s better than you think… I hope.

summary: I’m saying it’d be boring to film it now because there’s not much content in it, especially because they’ve already done it...
question: I’m saying it’d be boring to film it now because there’s not much content in it, especially because they’ve already done it before haha. but maybe if it was a mixture of tree decorating and something else!:) I hope so
answer: honestly no one’s gonna be watching SOLELY for the tree decorating. it’s about them doing something domestic and nice together and seeing them interact with each other in not such a structured manner. it’s kind of like the mukbang video. at the core, it was literally just them eating pizza, but really, it was about them talking and being open without feeling tied down to one specific topic. they’re able to take something that some people don’t see as exciting, and turn it into something that IS exciting. that’s what makes watching dnp doing anything so entertaining!
